example.eg: His stories never seem to relate to anything in the real world.
example.egtrans: 他的故事好像从来都不与现实中的任何事物相关。

example.eg: I can relate to his situation.
example.egtrans: 对于他的处境，我可以感同身受。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 感受到, 与…感同身受

example.eg: For a teenager, she relates well to adults.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 与...相处融洽, 和...关系处得好
